name: Reaper of Immortals
description:
My reaper rise! My reaper rage!



In a world ravaged by wars, death and agony, where kingdoms have fallen and cities were burned to ashes. In the aftermath of the Great War, the Mortal races struggle to rebuild what was lost and reshape what was destroyed.

Amidst the chaos, in the depths of agony and despair, bones were forged, and by the Eternal Flames they were ignited. A deathless and hollow reaper emerged from the fire.



All forms of life rejected him, even the dead, as if the world itself was fighting him, the reaper had no choice but to proceed forward and no one will stop him, that until he finds the ultimate truth.

Fight your way through hordes of enemies.
Reap everything that stands in your way.

Reaper of Immortals is a Pixel-art Platformer Adventure game, with a rich lore and world building, it tells the story of a lost reaper who is seeking his true purpose.



The game is about 5-6 hours long, with 4 world settings across 2 continents.
All the levels can be replayed in order to look for hidden chests, missed dialogues, secret paths, different play-styles and Steam Achievements.



  • 4 worlds with beautiful atmosphere.
  • 16 challenging levels.
  • 9 boss battles with different mechanics.
  • 20 plus types of enemies.
  • Thrilling adventure with unique characters and story telling.
  • Full Controller support.
  • Game stats and Achievements.
  • Ultra widescreen 21:9 support.



This game was created by a single person who put his heart and soul into making it, and with very little means.
